text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl where concept is-a _ContextControlAdditive

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ContextControlAdditiveContextControlAdditiveThe association adds to the existing context associated with the Act. Both this association and any associations propagated from ancestor Acts are interpreted as being related to this Act.

name: ContextControlAdditive
title: ContextControlAdditive
description: The association adds to the existing context associated with the Act. Both this association and any associations propagated from ancestor Acts are interpreted as being related to this Act.
